```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
boxplot(mpg ~ cyl, data=mtcars, main="MPG by Number of Cylinders", xlab="Cylinders", ylab="Miles per Gallon", col=c("red", "green", "blue")) 
```
